title: Democracy in America - phrase "let us beware"

content.question: The phrase "let us beware" (paragraph 2) helps establish the speaker as

choices.label: defensive about newly formed democratic republics
concerned about potential abuses of power within democratic republics
respectful of the power inherent in absolute monarchies

content.answer: concerned about potential abuses of power within democratic republics

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
